entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this afternoon. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 mm. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of drizzle or rain. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog. Amount 5 mm. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with showers. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016
